description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Lead the design team in developing a mobile first and customer first banking experience
              
              •	Develop the design philosophy for the entire bank, including but not limited to digital banking products, website, marketing collateral, presentation materials.
              
              •	Manage all projects using Design Thinking principles with agile methods
              
              •	Manage multiple work streams with varying timelines and complexity with authority and passion
              
              •	A proven, subject matter expert in the field of design, information architecture, writing, strategy, or production
              
              •	Partner with strategists, analysts, researchers and other groups at ACB to co-create Design briefs and set expectations for deliverables
              
              •	Package creative concepts and present to internal stakeholders in persuasive, articulate and compelling ways -- charismatic story telling skills are a must
              
              •	Support the Directors and Managing Directors in the overall growth and development of the Design capability across the company
              
              •	Be a go-getter with an entrepreneurial attitude and passion for innovative solutions and brand experiences that enable progress for our customers
              
              •	Manage the career development of cross-discipline resources and be a motivating and inspiring force in the Agency that gets the best performance out of people
              
              •	Accountability for the effective utilization of resources
              
              •	Be the voice of the customer and a champion for world-class brand experiences
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	10+ years of experience designing rich interactive brand, campaign and ecommerce experiences that drive results Print experience is a plus
              
              •	Comfort (and experience) leading Design, UX and Copy resources
              
              •	A deep knowledge of the Design Thinking methodology and experience leading teams through the process of investigation, ideation and implementation
              
              •	Experience managing a budget
              
              •	Associates or Bachelor's Degree in Graphic Design, New Media or related field
              
              •	Candidates should have an award-winning portfolio
              
              •	Experience in both website development and digital marketing including social marketing, video storytelling and static advertising A background in non-digital marketing (Brand and promotional TV and print) is a huge plus
              
              •	Very strong understanding of interaction design, site architecture, and designing intuitive user interfaces and navigation
              
              •	Proficient in all creative software packages (especially Adobe Creative Suite, iWork and Office)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
